roleset.name: to deceive

example.name: transitive
example.text: When Isabella (Ellen Lauren) confronts her brother Claudio (Matt Loney) in his cell, explaining the price she has been asked to secure his freedom; when [Isabella and the disguised Duke (Philip Kerr)]-4 conspire [*-4] to trick Angelo; and when Mariana (Annalee Jefferies), a woman wronged by Angelo, confronts him with his past misdeeds, the performers bring the dramatic high points to life with intense energy and intelligence.

roleset.note: Member of Vncls force-59-1. VN updated by Julia.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'trick' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.
